ALCANI

  1. Care este formula molecularÄƒ a unui alcan care are masa molarÄƒ M = 44?

Rezolvare: CnH2n+2C_{n}H_{2n + 2} este formula generalÄƒ a unui alcan È™i are M=12n+2n+2=14n+2M = 12n + 2n + 2 = 14n + 2

Atunci: 14n+2=44â†’14n=42â†’n=314n + 2 = 44 \rightarrow 14n = 42 \rightarrow n = 3

â†’C3H8esteformulamolecularÄƒaalcanului,propan\rightarrow C_{3}H_{8}\ este\ formula\ molecularÄƒ\ a\ alcanului,\ propan

  1. Care este formula molecularÄƒ a alcanului dacÄƒ prin arderea a 88 g alcan se formeazÄƒ 264 g bioxid de carbon?

Rezolvare: CnH2n+2+3n+12O2â†’nCO2+(n+1)H2OC_{n}H_{2n + 2} + {\frac{3n + 1}{2}O}_{2} \rightarrow n{CO}_{2} + (n + 1)H_{2}O

Atunci: la (14n+2) g alcan...................44n g bioxid de carbon

88 g alcan.............................264 g bioxid de carbon

264â€¢\bullet(14n+2)=44nâ€¢n \bullet 88â†’\rightarrow 84n+12= 88nâ†’\rightarrow12 = 4nâ†’\rightarrown =3,

deci C3H8esteformulamolecularÄƒaalcanului,propanC_{3}H_{8}\ este\ formula\ molecularÄƒ\ a\ alcanului,\ propan

  1. Ce formulÄƒ molecularÄƒ are o hidrocarburÄƒ care conÈ›ine 82,76% C È™i 17,24 % H È™i are masa molarÄƒ M = 58 ?
